attributes.action: Fund a public campaign to raise awareness of the early signs, causes and dangers of pulmonary embolisms, one of the largest causes of death in the UK each year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are unaware of the so-called “silent-killer” of pulmonary embolisms.  Resultantly, pulmonary embolisms are one of the largest causes of death in the UK each year, bringing tragedy to many families.  A programme of education and awareness is needed amongst the public to help identify the early signs, causes and dangers of embolisms to help prevent and reduce deaths from this condition.
